mapper.insert: insert into floor_information (bhf_code, drw_code, floorinfo_floor, floorinfo_rgsde) values ( #{bhf_code}, (select max(drw_code) from drawing), #{floorinfo_floor}, date(now()) )
mapper.select: select f.floorinfo_floor floorinfo_floor, d.drw_flpth drw_flpth from DRAWING d, FLOOR_INFORMATION f where BHF_CODE = #{bhf_code} and f.DRW_CODE = d.DRW_CODE order by FLOORINFO_FLOOR
